name: Set 'N Det
description:
Physics-based demolition puzzle game featuring 72 levels of increasing difficulty where you solve each challenge using various explosives.

After placing explosives during the 'Set Phase' you can select four triggers to detonate them during the 'Det Phase'. Strategic thinking and impeccable timing are crucial as you try to avoid collateral damage while completing each level’s objective and maintaining a positive score.

Looking for a new challenge? Complete all 72 levels to unlock the Zero Gravity Campaign where you can experience each level again in zero-g and access a new Anti-Gravity Explosive.

This is Cilithocal's first published game and comments are welcomed!
